level.text: Persons wishing to obtain a permit for a mobile sound unit shall submit an application in writing, or in person, to the Chief of Police.
Application for a mobile sound unit permit shall be made two (2) weeks before the permit is to be used.
The applicant shall supply the following information:
The applicant’s full name, address, and phone number;
The name of the organization requesting the permit (if any), and the applicant’s official position in the organization;
The purpose for the sound unit; and
The license number and description of the vehicle to be used.
Permits shall be issued only for sound units operating for a community, civic, or electoral purpose.
Permits shall not be issued for commercial advertising purposes.
All sound units are subject to applicable District laws and regulations governing noise control.
